labels.opportunityCostDelayToolTipSLC: Number of days that a markdown will be delayed if not approved. Used in calculating opportunity cost financials. Enter value between 1 and 10000 or -1000 (defer to eligible weeks rule)
labels.optimizePlanToBudgetDisabledMasterPlanTo: Optimize to a Budget can only be ran on non-approved working plans.
labels.optimizePlanToBudgetDisabledSecurityRigh: Optimize to a Budget is currently unavailable. Please contact Revionics Support.
labels.optimizePlanToBudgetDisabledWorkingPlanT: Optimize to a Budget can only be ran on non-approved working plans.
labels.optimizeToBudgetFinancialPeriod: Financial Period for Next Available Mark
labels.otbAutoApproveTooltip: Allow Optimize to Budget process to approve next actionable markdown steps that adhere to budget constraints within the approval time window.
labels.overrideEditor_MarkdownStepsText: Click Add Step to define each step of the override markdown plan. Each subsequent step must start at a later date and offer a greater discount than the previous step. All dates must fall within the markdown event dates.
labels.overrideEditor_MarkdownStepsTextNote: Note: You can enter a date only, or a discount only, and optimization will recommend the other.
labels.overrideEditor_StoreProductText: Select the checkboxes to add products (in all stores) to the override group. To add a product only at selected stores, click the UPC link to open the store selection screen. If a product-store is already in another override group, it will not be available for selection.
labels.overrideGroup_CanOnlyHaveOneGroupSetToOv: Only one Override Group can be set to override all products and stores
labels.overrideGroupHelp: Click the Help button to learn more.
labels.overrideGroupReviewFooter: Important: After closing this wizard, you must optimize your markdown group for the override to take effect and be reflected in the markdown forecast.
labels.overrideGroupText: Override groups allow you to manually define a markdown plan for selected product-stores (steps, dates, and discounts) that are different than in the parent markdown group.
labels.overrideGroupTextNote: To get started, enter a descriptive name and optional comments for this override group.
labels.pctOffLatticeToolTipSLC: Enter a comma separated list of allowed markdown steps for optimization
labels.planActionMenuIconsComparePlansTitle: Compare markdown plans for the current area of business
labels.planActionMenuIconsDownloadTitle: Click to download visible data in this screen
labels.planEditor2Content: I am the rulesets editor, comming soon...
labels.planMultipleValuesTooltip: This field has multiple values for the selected row(s) in the grid.
labels.planOptimizedToBudgetSubmitButtonDisable: Please validate the optimize to budget configuration, and try again.
labels.planOverrideEditorConfirmButtonTooltip: Confirm to delete the accepted product(s)/store(s).
labels.planOverrideEditorDeleteButtonTooltip: Approved plans and accepted products/stores can be deleted.
labels.planOverrideEditorMultipleValuesTooltip: This field has multiple values for the selected row(s) in the grid.
labels.planOverrideEditorSaveButtonTooltip: Master plans and approved working plans can not be updated.
labels.planOverrideValueTypeTooltipText: Select a discount type in order to enter a discount value to override a markdown
labels.planSaveButtonTooltip: Master plans and approved working plans can not be updated.
labels.planViewMarkdownPlanComparisonscreenTool: Compare markdown plans for the current area of business
labels.priceFamilyCoherenceToolTip: Check to mark down products in a Price Family similarly
labels.priceFamilyCoherenceToolTipSLC: Turn on for optimization to recommend markdowns for products in a Price Family similarly
labels.priceTypeToolTip: Select how Markdown Optimization will execute
labels.priceTypeToolTipSLC: Select discount type that Markdown Optimization will use for recommending markdowns
labels.promoCollisionStatusAfter: One or more promotions occur after this Markdown Event
labels.promoCollisionStatusBefore: One or more promotions occur before this Markdown Event
labels.promoCollisionStatusCollision: One or more promotions overlap with this Markdown Event
labels.promoCollisionStatusSurrounding: Two or more promotions occur before and after this Markdown Event
labels.recallSubmitPlanButtonSecurityDisabledTo: User does not have security rights to submit markdown plans.
labels.rejectPlanButtonSecurityDisabledTooltip: User does not have security rights to decline markdown plans.
labels.reoptimizeToolTip: Check to perform automatic Weekly Markdown Reoptimization Weekly
labels.reoptimizeToolTipSLC: Check to perform automatic Markdown reoptimization whenever new data is processed.
labels.reportFieldLabel: Select a Performance Intelligence chart to display for the current plan
labels.selectAllStoresAndReturn: Select All Stores and Return To Products
labels.selectDateRangeText: Select the date range that you want to reject on
labels.selectInventoryTargets: Please select the products to provide Inventory Targets.
labels.selectProductsInsideApproveWizardDescrip: Select the products from this markdown group you would like to Approve. If you want to select a product for all stores it belongs to, check a box below. Otherwise, drill in to the product to set the stores for that product you would like to Approve.
labels.selectRejectProductText: Select the products from this markdown group you would like to Reject.
labels.storeQuickSearchFieldToolTip: Select the type of value to search for within Stores.
labels.storeQuickSearchOperatorsToolTip: Select the type of operator you wish to search by. All operator types except 'In' take one value.  Comma separated lists can be entered when the 'In' operator is chosen.
labels.storeQuickSearchValueToolTip: Please enter data to search for.
labels.storesAtDiscountPercentByDayPlanReportTi: Stores at Discount Percent By Day
labels.styleCoherenceToolTip: Check to mark down products w/ same style similarly
labels.styleCoherenceToolTipSLC: Select an option for style, color, and/or sizes to markdown similarly
labels.submitplanButtonSecurityDisabledTooltip: User does not have security rights to submit markdown plans.
labels.targetRuleExitDateToolTip: Exit date used by optimization when recommending markdowns.
labels.targetRuleGroupDatesDescription: Edit the exit date optimization will use for the selected rows.
labels.targetRuleGroupInventoryDescription: Edit remaining inventory calculation type and amount optimization will use for the selected rows.
labels.targetRuleInventoryTargetTypeToolTip: Inventory target type to be used during optimization when recommending markdowns.
labels.temporaryMarkdownsTooltip: Markdown steps eligible for temporary markdowns. Enter a comma separated list of the markdown steps where markdown loss is calculated at the point of sale.
labels.tempStepEndingNumberSetToolTipSLC: Select the ending number rule set to be applied for all temporary markdowns.
labels.timingConsistentOverrideNotification: The markdown group is timing consistent. An override to the dates will automatically be applied to all items and stores.
labels.zeroDepthChangeToolTip: Check to allow zero depth change

messages.approvePlanButtonSubmitRequired: User does not have security rights to approve markdown plans directly, plan requires submission before approval.
messages.confirmProductMovedMessage: This product cannot be moved because the target group is Timing Coherent. Would you like to make the target group not Timing Coherent?
messages.informationMessageForPlanApprovalLockedP: Another plan within your area of business has already been approved, please decline that plan before proceeding.
messages.informationMessageForPlanApprovalWorking: Please create a working plan in order to approve future markdown steps.
messages.informationMessageForPlanRecallSubmitWor: Please create a working plan in order to submit future markdown steps for approval
messages.informationMessageForPlanSubmitWorkingPl: Please create a working plan in order to submit future markdown steps for approval
messages.markdownGroupStatusUpdatedToApprove: Group status updated to approved successfully.
messages.markdownGroupStatusUpdatedToCancel: Group status updated to cancelled successfully.
messages.markdownGroupStatusUpdatedToPlanning: Group status updated to planning successfully.
messages.markdownOptimizationJobSubmitted: An on-demand optimization job has been submitted. PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT THE JOB AGAIN UNTIL THE CURRENT JOB IS COMPLETED. You can view the completion status on the View Optimization Jobs screen. When the job is complete, refresh this page to view the optimized plan.
messages.markdownOverrideStepDeleted: Markdown override steps have been deleted.
messages.markdownPlanBeingCopied: Copying a large plan can take several minutes. Access to the new plan is not available until the process is completed (you may have to refresh your screen).
messages.markdownPlanStatusUpdateFail: User does not have appropriate rights to perform this action.
messages.markdownRemovePlanRestrictionMessage: The current user does not have access to remove past markdown exports. Please contact Revionics support for further information.
messages.markdownRollupNoDataMessage: No rollups are currently available, All rollup types contain only one unique data element.
messages.planEditorRestrictionApproveOnly: User does not have security rights to alter markdown plans.
messages.planEditorRestrictionMessage: Create a working plan or decline the current approved plan to edit product/stores.
messages.planEditorRestrictionsForAccepted: Cannot modify rows with accepted markdowns. Decline accepted rows or filter out accepted markdowns in order to modify.
messages.planInventoryAndFinancialsNoRowSelectedM: Please select product or store data to view additional details.
messages.planScreenTooSmallMessage: Your screen size is too narrow to show the pane with the other information currently displayed. Please enlarge your screen and open the pane again.
